/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. Trees dot the sidewalk, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
